ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_01_10:
Pikachu? Does anybody
have a Pikachu?
ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_02_10:
I want to meet one and
rub cheeks with it...
ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_03_10: This is an isle of dreams.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_02_10:
Just by raising a Pikachu, you’d become the
center of attention.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_03_10:
There aren’t any Trainers with Pikachu 
back where I’m from, but I’m sure 
I can meet one on Pasio!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_04_10: That’s what makes Pasio the island of dreams!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0702_01_10:
I think the secret to a Pikachu’s cuteness comes
from its tail.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0702_02_10:
It zigs like this and zags like that. It’s just
way too cute!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_1031_02_10:
Look how he’s playing 
with his ball.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_01_10:
I wish I were the ball that my Seel is
playing with.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_02_10: Roll me around, frolic with me, and ignore me.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_03_10:
Do you understand my feelings? You do, right?
That’s how much I love my Seel!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0702_01_10:
I don’t care if he loses interest in me and
forgets me.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0702_02_10:
In fact, because I’m there as a point of
comparison, Seel looks that much cuter!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_1031_01_10:
I want this...
but I want that, too...
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_1031_03_10:
I know I have to watch
my spending, but...
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_01_10: Buying things at the shop is my favorite pastime!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_02_10:
If I see any new Pokémon goods, I can’t help but
buy them.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_03_10:
If I hear something’s a limited edition, I hold
nothing back!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_04_10:
I can make money whenever, but I can only get
limited editions then and there!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0702_01_10: But of course I think money is important.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0702_02_10:
If I didn’t have money, I wouldn’t be able to
buy new goods!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_1031_02_10:
Hmm, would like to make
my partner stronger...
ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_1031_03_10:
Need to coordinate with
my team, though...
ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_01_10:
Are you using the café?
You can make your partner stronger or edit your
team there.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_02_10:
It’s great that it’s in the Pokémon Center
and we can use it whenever we want!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_03_10: Go there with your Pokémon and relax sometime!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0702_01_10:
Heh heh. You know, I enjoy sitting at the café
and watching the Trainers come into the
Pokémon Center with their Pokémon.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0702_02_10:
A lot of Trainers walk around with their Pokémon
out of their Poké Balls. This place is great!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1031_02_10:
I must not have enough
love for my Pokémon.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1031_03_10:
I have so much to learn
from a Poké Fan.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_01_10:
Pokémon aren’t just
creatures to catch.
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_02_10:
As long as you can stay
with your Pokémon...
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_03_10:
then they can be a part of
your collection!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_02_10: Wow, this many! That is amazing!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_03_10: If you love Pokémon like I do, this much is easy!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_04_10: But there aren’t any wild Pokémon here, right?
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_05_10:
You don’t have to catch them. If you become
friends with me, you can play with my Pokémon
whenever you like!
ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_07_10:
Come over to my house sometime.
We have plenty to talk about!
